name: Coups d'œil
description:
A 2D game you play with your eyes only via the TOBII Eye Tracker. Light up a fairy village and make it party through five different levels.

The game is focused on presenting several interactions between your eyes and various characters and objects on the screen. It takes place in a cute and whimsical fairy world, full of colors and surprises.

Developed in four months by a team of four as a school project in our first year at the CNAM-ENJMIN (Angoulême, France)

Graphic Design and Original Idea : Volodia Chamard

Sound Design : Tristan Pradens

Game Design : Jean Nicolas

Project Management, Programming and UE Design : Benjamin Misiak

Additional thanks to : Anize Amestoy for the main musical theme, Thibault Baron for help in Wwise integration.
